imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal abstract AI logo mark with subtle gradient on dark background (ai-logic-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Simplified monochrome/duotone favicon version of the logo mark (ai-logic-favicon.dim_32x32.png)
- Wide minimal header/hero background with soft gradient and light noise texture, no text (ai-logic-hero.dim_1600x400.png)

existing_features.title: Generate original branding images for AI Logic with a modern minimal AI-assistant aesthetic similar in vibe to Grok AI and ChatGPT (clean, high-contrast, subtle gradients), without copying or tracing any protected logos or exact assets.

Add the generated branding images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI: replace the current header bot icon with the generated AI Logic logo mark, and use the favicon image in the HTML head.
Ensure the updated branding visuals remain consistent with the existing Tailwind theme tokens and do not introduce a new blue/purple-dominant palette.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create an image (branding/visual) in a style similar to Grok AI and ChatGPT

projectName: Add AI Logic branding images inspired by Grok AI and ChatGPT style
